graph_title: Number of countries with migration policies that facilitate orderly, safe, regular and responsible migration and mobility of people
indicator_name: Number of countries with migration policies that facilitate orderly, safe, regular and responsible migration and mobility of people
page_content:
Non-statistical indicator

We have identified the following to be relevant to this indicator - Immigrate to Canada and Refugees and asylum.

fr.graph_title: Number of countries with migration policies that facilitate orderly, safe, regular and responsible migration and mobility of people
fr.indicator_name: Number of countries with migration policies that facilitate orderly, safe, regular and responsible migration and mobility of people
fr.page_content:
Indicateur non statistique

Nous avons identifié les éléments suivants comme étant pertinents pour cet indicateur - Immigrer au Canada et Réfugiés et demandes d'asile.
fr.SDG_GOAL: Objectif 10 : Réduire les inégalités dans les pays et d’un pays à l’autre
fr.SDG_TARGET: Cible 10.7 : Faciliter la migration et la mobilité de façon ordonnée, sûre, régulière et responsable, notamment par la mise en œuvre de politiques migratoires planifiées et bien gérées.
fr.SDG_INDICATOR: Indicateur 10.7.2 : Nombre de pays dotés de politiques migratoires qui facilitent la migration et la mobilité de façon ordonnée, sûre, régulière et responsible.
fr.SDG_GOAL__GLOBAL: Objectif 10 : Réduire les inégalités dans les pays et d’un pays à l’autre
fr.SDG_TARGET__GLOBAL: Cible 10.7 : Faciliter la migration et la mobilité de façon ordonnée, sûre, régulière et responsable, notamment par la mise en œuvre de politiques migratoires planifiées et bien gérées.
fr.SDG_INDICATOR__GLOBAL: Indicateur 10.7.2 : Nombre de pays dotés de politiques migratoires qui facilitent la migration et la mobilité de façon ordonnée, sûre, régulière et responsible.
fr.un_custodian_agency: Département des affaires économiques et sociales de l'ONU (DESA), Organisation internationale pour les migrations (OIM)
fr.goal_meta_link_text: Métadonnées des objectifs de développement durable des Nations Unies

SDG_GOAL: Goal 10: Reduce inequality within and among countries
SDG_TARGET: Target 10.7: Facilitate orderly, safe, regular and responsible migration and mobility of people, including through the implementation of planned and well-managed migration policies
SDG_INDICATOR: Indicator 10.7.2: Number of countries with migration policies to facilitate orderly, safe, regular and responsible migration and mobility of people
STAT_CONC_DEF: SDG Indicator 10.7.2 aims to describe the state of national migration policies and how such policies change over time. The information collected seeks to identify both progress made and gaps, thus contributing to the evidence base for actionable recommendations for the implementation of SDG target 10.7. The indicator also serves for the future thematic reviews at the High-level Political Forum on Sustainable Development (HLPF).
SDG_GOAL__GLOBAL: Goal 10: Reduce inequality within and among countries
SDG_TARGET__GLOBAL: Target 10.7: Facilitate orderly, safe, regular and responsible migration and mobility of people, including through the implementation of planned and well-managed migration policies
SDG_INDICATOR__GLOBAL: Indicator 10.7.2: Number of countries with migration policies to facilitate orderly, safe, regular and responsible migration and mobility of people
un_custodian_agency: United Nations Department of Economic and Social Affairs (DESA), International Organization for Migration (IOM)
